files.description: Implements complete configuration loading/saving/merging utilities (YAML/JSON), schema-like validation hooks, and path resolution for the refactored system.

files.description: Provides a reusable, convention-driven plotting configuration layer (themes, rcParams, figure sizing, colormaps) and helpers to apply/serialize plotting settings.

files.description: Defines the modular workflow configuration model (architectures, stages, parameters, presets) and utilities to assemble and validate end-to-end runs.
Contains canonical default configurations and named presets for IO, plotting, and workflow that eliminate duplicated inline settings across the codebase.
Centralizes custom exception types and rich error formatting for configuration parsing, validation, and missing/invalid fields.
Documents the standardized, modular configuration architecture (IO, plotting, workflow), conventions, and examples for maintainable reuse across artifacts.
